message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $95 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original asking price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering my budget, I can go up to $87 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
